languages.text: "Ты умрешь в холодной пустоте, твое сердце источат ядовитые лучи звезд, твои легкие станут ледяными деревьями в груди! Ты никогда не обрящешь милости Многорукого Императора!" {n}Старик обещает вам кары со злобным наслаждением.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты умрешь в холодной пустоте, твое сердце источат ядовитые лучи звезд, твои легкие станут ледяными деревьями в груди! Ты никогда не обрящешь милости Многорукого Императора!" {n}Старик обещает вам кары со злобным наслаждением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall decay beneath the toxic rays of suns, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Emperor-in-the-Void!" {n}The old man calls plague after plague down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall decay beneath the toxic rays of suns, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Emperor-in-the-Void!" {n}The old man calls plague after plague down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall decay beneath the toxic rays of suns, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Emperor-in-the-Void!" {n}The old man calls plague after plague down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall decay beneath the toxic rays of suns, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Emperor-in-the-Void!" {n}The old man calls plague after plague down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

"You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous périrez dans le vide glacial, votre cœur se décomposera sous la lumière toxique d'étoiles indifférentes, vos poumons se couvriront de glace ! Jamais l'Empereur aux mille bras ne vous accordera sa grâce ! » {n}Une lueur malveillante, mais satisfaite dans le regard, le vieil homme vous maudit maintes fois de suite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous périrez dans le vide glacial, votre cœur se décomposera sous la lumière toxique d'étoiles indifférentes, vos poumons se couvriront de glace ! Jamais l'Empereur aux mille bras ne vous accordera sa grâce ! » {n}Une lueur malveillante, mais satisfaite dans le regard, le vieil homme vous maudit maintes fois de suite.{/n}

« Vous périrez dans le vide glacial, votre cœur se décomposera sous les rayons toxiques des soleils, vos poumons se couvriront de glace ! Jamais l'Empereur-dans-le-vide ne vous accordera sa grâce ! » {n}Une lueur malveillante, mais satisfaite dans le regard, le vieil homme vous menace de fléaux tous plus terribles les uns que les autres.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Morirás en el frío del vacío, tu corazón dejará de latir bajo la luz de estrellas indiferentes, tus pulmones serán árboles de hielo en tu pecho! ¡Nunca recibirás la gracia del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos!». {n}El anciano te maldice con una desgracia tras otra con una satisfacción rencorosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Morirás en el frío del vacío, tu corazón dejará de latir bajo la luz de estrellas indiferentes, tus pulmones serán árboles de hielo en tu pecho! ¡Nunca recibirás la gracia del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos!». {n}El anciano te maldice con una desgracia tras otra con una satisfacción rencorosa.{/n}

«¡Morirás en el frío del vacío, tu corazón se pudrirá bajo los rayos tóxicos de los soles, tus pulmones serán árboles de hielo en tu pecho! ¡Nunca recibirás la gracia del Emperador del Vacío!». {n}El anciano te condena a una desgracia tras otra con una satisfacción rencorosa.{/n}

languages.text: “你们会在冰冷的虚空中消亡！你们的心跳将在恶毒的星光下停止！你们的肺将会在你们的胸膛里结冰！你们永远别想得到四臂神皇的恩典！”{n}这位老人带着恶毒的满足，对你道出了一连串的诅咒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们会在冰冷的虚空中消亡！你们的心跳将在恶毒的星光下停止！你们的肺将会在你们的胸膛里结冰！你们永远别想得到四臂神皇的恩典！”{n}这位老人带着恶毒的满足，对你道出了一连串的诅咒。{/n}
“你们会在冰冷的虚空中消亡！你们的心脏将在恶毒的日光下溃烂！你们的肺将会在你们的胸膛里结冰！你们永远别想得到虚空帝皇的恩典！”{n}这位老人带着恶毒的满足，对你道出了一连串的诅咒。{/n}

languages.text: 「お前は冷たい虚空で滅び、無関心な星々の光の下で、あなたの心は最後の鼓動を打つだろう、肺は胸の中で氷の木となる！多腕の皇帝の恩寵を受けることはない！」{n}老人は次から次へと呪いを、あなたに満足感げに言った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は冷たい虚空で滅び、無関心な星々の光の下で、あなたの心は最後の鼓動を打つだろう、肺は胸の中で氷の木となる！多腕の皇帝の恩寵を受けることはない！」{n}老人は次から次へと呪いを、あなたに満足感げに言った。{/n}
「お前は冷たい虚空で滅び、心臓は太陽の有毒な光線の下で腐敗し、肺は胸の中で氷の木となる！ヴォイドの皇帝の恩寵を受けることはない！」{n}老人は次から次へと災いを、あなたに満足感げに言った。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr werdet in der kalten Leere verenden, Euer Herz wird unter dem Licht unbarmherziger Sterne verklingen, Eure Lungen werden zu Bäumen aus Eis in Eurer Brust werden! Ihr werdet niemals die Gnade des vielarmigen Imperators empfangen!" {n}Der alte Mann schleudert dir voller gehässiger Befriedigung Flüche entgegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You shall perish in the cold void, your heart shall beat its last under the light of uncaring stars, your lungs shall become trees of ice within your chest! You will never receive the grace of the Many-Armed Emperor!" {n}The old man calls curse after curse down upon you with spiteful satisfaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet in der kalten Leere verenden, Euer Herz wird unter dem Licht unbarmherziger Sterne verklingen, Eure Lungen werden zu Bäumen aus Eis in Eurer Brust werden! Ihr werdet niemals die Gnade des vielarmigen Imperators empfangen!" {n}Der alte Mann schleudert dir voller gehässiger Befriedigung Flüche entgegen.{/n}

"Ihr werdet in der kalten Leere verenden, Euer Herz wird unter den giftigen Strahlen von Sonnen verkümmern, Eure Lungen werden zu Bäumen aus Eis in Eurer Brust werden! Ihr werdet niemals die Gnade des Imperators-in-der-Leere empfangen!" {n}Der alte Mann ruft voller gehässiger Befriedigung Seuche um Seuche auf dich herab.{/n}
